page.title: 07Club in Long Marton
page.content: There is a playgroup in Long Marton on the institute.The only one in our block.It is run by Mrs.Abbott.They meet on Monday and Tuesday.On Monday all children from 6 months-4 years go together and on Tuesday just the 3-4 years group The children paint,glue,cut to make pictures.They have plastercine,bricks, lego and building games.There is a slide,trampoline and mats.They have a wendy house,dressing up clothes,sand and water,jigsaw puzzles,games and stories during the afternoon they have milk and biscuits.The playgroup has strong links with school. Mr.Davies runs a Youth Club in the institute on a Thursday 7-9 p.m.There is a television room,pool,snooker, darts and table tennis.They play games and have refreshments.A raffle is held every week,most people get a prize.
